column1: Biomedical Sciences - Medical Molecular Biology MSc
column5: Our Biomedical Sciences (Medical Molecular Biology) MSc course enables you to study cutting-edge molecular methods employed for the understanding of molecular mechanisms of diseases and for their diagnosis and treatment. Your studies will be underpinned by essential knowledge in genetics, cell signalling and molecular medicine.You'll be offered the flexibility to select option modules that reflect your own interest in molecular biology and these will be combined with core modules and an independent research project. The course is suitable for newly qualified graduates, those employed in related work and those with medical qualifications.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
